channel.title: Another questions about frame 114 or packet 114 w\e (system update)

item.title: Another questions about frame 114 or packet 114 w\e (system update)
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ok i fianly got it to work so everyone can see it

else if (command.startsWith("f114")) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { int x1 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); person.frame114(x1*2); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }}}}

but the problem is is that when some one logs on or logs out and in they cant see it?
is there anyway to make that possible?

edit:
hmm i just got a idea!
wouldnt i have to make it a boolean and add it to the login method?

but i dont know what itd look like?

Read full topic
item.source: Another questions about frame 114 or packet 114 w\e (system update)
